name: @neochic/woodlets
description: Create WordPress Widgets using Twig Templates

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:composer && npm run install:bower
scripts.install:composer: php composer.phar install || curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php || php composer.phar install
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:js && npm run build:less && npm run build:artifact
scripts.build:js: node node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o BaseUrl=js/ name=../bower_components/requirejs/require include=main.js mainConfigFile=js/requirejs-config.js out=js/main-build.js
